name: Beef Pilaf
description: Aromatic beef pilaf served with tender stewed beef, seasoned with a blend of spices.
instructions: Sauté beef with onions and garlic until browned.
Add carrots and spices, then stir.
Add rice and water, then bring to a boil.
Reduce heat, cover, and simmer until rice is cooked.

name: Chicken Rice Bowl
description: Bowl of rice topped with tender chicken, served with a mix of fresh vegetables.
instructions: Cook rice according to package instructions.
Sauté chicken with ginger and garlic until cooked through.
Add mixed vegetables and soy sauce, then stir-fry.
Serve chicken and vegetables over rice.

name: Black Pepper Chicken
description: Delicious black pepper chicken served with crisp colorful vegetables.
instructions: Marinate chicken in soy sauce and black pepper.
Sauté chicken with onions and garlic until cooked.
Add bell peppers and stir-fry until tender.
Serve with rice or noodles.

name: Tandoori Chicken
description: Tandoori chicken served with naan bread and a side of yogurt sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tandoori spices.
Grill or bake chicken until cooked through.
Serve with naan bread and yogurt sauce made with cucumber and mint.

name: Baked Chicken Drumsticks
description: Baked chicken drumsticks with orange and smoked paprika, served with roasted vegetables.
instructions: Marinate chicken drumsticks in orange juice and smoked paprika.
Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 35-40 minutes.
Roast mixed vegetables in olive oil and herbs until tender.
Serve chicken with roasted vegetables.

name: Chicken Biryani
description: Flavorful chicken biryani served with raita and a side of mixed pickles.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and biryani spices.
Cook chicken with onions and tomatoes until tender.
Layer chicken with cooked basmati rice.
Steam until flavors are well combined.
Serve with raita and pickles.

name: Chicken Skewers
description: Grilled chicken skewers with sweet peppers and dill, served with a side of rice.
instructions: Marinate chicken and sweet peppers in olive oil, garlic, and dill.
Thread onto skewers and grill until cooked.
Serve with a side of rice.
